message: Hello Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to exceed expectations and deliver unparalleled performance. We believe its value extends far beyond its tangible features, making it an investment that could significantly benefit you in the long run. Considering its unique qualities and the time, effort, and resources dedicated to its creation, we kindly propose a purchase price of $2000000. We look forward to discussing this opportunity further with you.

Thank you for offering such a high-quality product. I appreciate the value and craftsmanship that has gone into creating it. However, given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet the proposed price. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1500000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations and allows us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
